name: // theFourthHero
description:
A ruined kingdom is longing for a hero. Do you have what it takes?

<DISCLAIMER>

-This game is not recommended for those that suffer from depression, anxiety or any other mental illness.

-Please, remember that this is only a game and it shouldn't be taken seriously. 

-You are not good enough to play this game, so you shouldn't play it.

-Thank you for reading, and enjoy the game if you are brave enough to play it.

</DISCLAIMER>

<SYNOPSIS>

In the fantasy land of Eternia, Angela, a survivor of the catastrophe that devoured the kingdom, spends her days waiting for a hero to come. A hero who would jump into danger and save the souls that were turned into an endless horde of monsters. As days pass by, she sees how those monsters are taking more and more land for themselves, but she never lost hope that a true hero will arrive: you.

</SYNOPSIS>

<CHARACTERS>

Proxy - An empty shell capable of support the soul of an human being, even one as great as yours.

Angela - A certified magician that fights restlessly to save the ruined kingdom.

Leona - A woman touched by darkness that defends the settlement from monsters.

</CHARACTERS>

<FEATURES>

-Fight monsters in intense, LMBS fights!

-Get your bag ready and jump into adventure!

-Master powerful skills to win every battle!

-Traverse maps filled with a magical spark!

-Become the hero that will bring hope back!

-Do heroic feats and earn stars!

</FEATURES> <ABOUT>

Genre: Fantasy, Fourth Wall breaker RPG

Engine: RPG Maker MV

Battle System: LMBS (Linear Motion Battle System)

Encounter Type: Map Encounters

Language: English and Spanish

Length: To fully complete the demo: around 40 minutes, probably less. To truly finish it: don't bother, you don´t have what it takes.

Maturity: You must be older than 13 to play this game

Price: FREE. This demo is completely free, so will be the complete version of the game. But if you want to donate to increase the LV of  your Charity perk and unlock a ton of amazing passive skills, you can do it! (And I will love you forever!)

</ABOUT> <BUGS REPORT/THINGS TO KNOW>

-Characters walk and dash with the same pose in battle.

-For the demo, there will be only one battle theme instead of one per zone as I have planned (All songs will be updated when I learn how those dammed DAWs works XD).

</BUGS REPORT/THINGS TO KNOW>  <REVIEWS>

-The only game you will never beat.   -   A_Bot

-I never thought a game will play with me instead of me playing with it... At least I found all the Easter Eggs!    -    Your President

-Open the game, chose a path, clear it and stop there!. Do this and you will not end up humiliated.    -   That One Important Dude 

</REVIEWS>   <ONE LAST THING>

Special thanks to the RPG Maker and gaming community, specially you. Thanks for playing! <3 I really appreciate that. Please, don't be shy and let me know how to make this game something better for all of us that like the noble art of playing a good RPG. And now, jump the Wall and become the hero!

</ONE LAST THING>
